text: kathmandu , nepal monsoon flooding has left 50,000 people homeless in nepal and killed at least 74 people in northern india , according to officials . monsoon rain has bought heavy flooding to southern nepal , pictured , and northern india . the nepalese army thursday used helicopters to rescue residents in southeastern nepal who were stranded on treetops and roofs after monsoon flooding forced more than 50,000 people from their homes . in northern india monsoon flooding destroyed mud huts and killed at least 74 people , officials said . the deaths were in the state of uttar pradesh . the latest casualties bring to more than 300 the number of people killed in india since the start of this year 's monsoon season . nepalese officials said at least four southern villages were inundated with water after the embankment on the saptakoshi river burst monday . some 40,000 people were now living in government-run relief camps ; others had gone to other villages to stay with relatives , authorities said . nepalese home ministry officials said there were unconfirmed reports of deaths related to the flooding but authorities could not reach the affected areas to verify those reports . police and army troops had been using elephants , boats and helicopters to rescue stranded villagers in sunsari district , about 400 km -lrb- 249 miles -rrb- southeast of kathmandu , since monday . nepal amd india are in the midst of the annual monsoon season . copyright 2008 cnn . all rights reserved.this material may not be published , broadcast , rewritten , or redistributed . associated press contributed to this report .
